original_text: Moreover the candlesticks with their lamps, that they should burn after the manner before the oracle, of pure gold;
korean_text: 지성소 앞에서 규례대로 불을 켤 순금 등잔대와 그 등잔이며

sentences.original_text: Moreover the candlesticks with their lamps
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 그 등잔과 함께 있는 촛대들은

sentences.original_text: that they should burn after the manner
